title: AuditEvent
description: A single recorded action or decision by a jx-42 agent.

event_id.description: UUID v4 identifier for the event.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 datetime when the event was recorded.

agent.description: Name of the agent that produced the event.

payload.description: Action-specific data. Schema varies by action type.

policy_flags.description: List of policy IDs evaluated during this event (e.g., ['P-01', 'P-03']).

user_ref.description: Opaque reference to the user who triggered the event. Must not contain PII.

session_id.description: UUID v4 session identifier grouping related events.
